definitions.definition: To point out; to discover; to direct to a knowledge of; to show; to make known.
definitions.example: The guard blew his whistle to indicate imminent departure.

definitions.definition: To show or manifest by symptoms; to point to as the proper remedies.
definitions.example: Great prostration of strength indicates the use of stimulants.

definitions.definition: To signal in a vehicle the desire to turn right or left.
To investigate the condition or power of, as of steam engine, by means of an indicator.
